actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 for States adopting safety belt use laws.

summary.text: Excludes motor vehicles offered for sale within a State awarded an incentive grant to meet the Secretary of Transportation's safety standards from the requirement of having a starter interlock system or related devices associated with seatbelts or upper torso restraints. (Amends 23 U.S.C. 402(j))

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 for States adopting safety belt use laws.
